pageContext.claim: “Thank you to all of my great supporters, really big progress being made. Other countries wanting to fix crazy trade deals. Economy is ROARING. Supreme Court pick getting GREAT REVIEWS. New Poll says Trump, at over 90%, is the most popular Republican in history of the Party. Wow!”
pageContext.analysis: A recent Gallup poll found that 90 percent of Republicans approve of Trump's performance. But that doesn't make him the "most popular Republican in history." George W. Bush maintained an approval rating close to 99 percent of Republicans during his first term.
